desc: Asking a friend (word-of-mouth) has traditionally been the best way to find a new hair and beauty salon. At Salon Invitation, we only represent industry leading salons. Their salon professionals listen, consult, advise and aim to earn client's trust. It just so happens we make finding them easy & affordable.

layout.text: FINALLY, SALONS WHO LISTEN, CONSULT, ADVISE AND SURPASS CLIENT EXPECTATIONS. EVERY TIME.
IT JUST SO HAPPENS WE MAKE IT EASY FOR YOU TO CONNECT WITH ONE
